snippet: RESEK--Dr. Carl Peter, died peacefully in his home in Petaluma, California on May 27, 2016 at age 86. Born in the Czech Republic in 1929, Dr. Resek immigrated to the U.S. in 1939. A distinguished scholar and academic of American Intellectual History, Dr. Resek leaves his beloved wife, Dr. Shirley Blum, his two children, Dr. John Resek and Susan Resek, his stepson Jason Blum, and his two grandchildren, Anna Resek and Ethan Miller. 1/3
lead_paragraph: RESEK--Dr. Carl Peter, died peacefully in his home in Petaluma, California on May 27, 2016 at age 86. Born in the Czech Republic in 1929, Dr. Resek immigrated to the U.S. in 1939. A distinguished scholar and academic of American Intellectual History, Dr. Resek leaves his beloved wife, Dr. Shirley Blum, his two children, Dr. John Resek and Susan Resek, his stepson Jason Blum, and his two grandchildren, Anna Resek and Ethan Miller. 1/3
